@arham_4 wrote:

Cause its only a show…The landscape I like, it’s okay if you don’t like.

Fix that attitude now. You’re gonna get nowhere with it.

You, as the owner, need to follow the customers, not your own-selves opinion.

EDIT: I read your other posts. Your pretty selfish…

item.title: Project Pk
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Rsclassic2013, post:3, topic:522447”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=640946.msg4318548#msg4318548 date=1371872647]

Why are you so focused on staff items/features?

Also, that landscape looks messed up, you should spend some time to polish it up.

Cause its only a show…The landscape I like, it’s okay if you don’t like. It took me 2 days to get it to were I want it. If you have any suggestions on which landscape editor to use please do. Plus I use Rsc Community Landscape editor. It is very hard to learn something and get compliment saying that I suck at editing the landscape. I wish I can switch to the minds of those “masters of editing” so that I can go on with my developing…
[/quote]I don’t understand why you’re showing off things the majority of players will never be able to use…

Also, it’s not the editor’s fault you don’t pay attention to any details… Literally everything I see has a straight edge, all the same level, isn’t smoothed, and tons of oddly placed objects.

Also, I was being polite when I said you should polish it up… If you think that I was being mean/rude, then you’re really naive…

Nah, I like my work…that is all I have to say. It is “my” choice of what I do and not do. Thank you for commenting. :)[/quote]I never said it wasn’t your choice… It’s pretty obvious that it is. I was just pointing out that it’s a bad choice, and that you should clean up the landscape so people will think you care about a server you’re going to release.

Read full topic
